scriptedEmail.name: Media File Created
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notifications to gallery owners when a new file is created in the gallery and they have file notifications to owners turned on.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
#set($mediaUrl = false) #set($mediaUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.Media.Url) #set($authorUrl = false) #set($authorUrl = $context_v1_email.Context.Media.Author.Url)

#if ($authorUrl)
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Media.Author.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', title='', width='32', height='32' }")
#else
$core_v2_ui.GetResizedImageHtml($context_v1_email.Context.Media.Author.AvatarUrl, 32, 32, "%{ ResizeMethod='ScaleDown', ScaleFactor=2, OutputIsPersisted='True', title='', width='32', height='32' }")
#end 		#if ($authorUrl) $context_v1_email.Context.Media.Author.DisplayName #else $context_v1_email.Context.Media.Author.DisplayName #end

$context_v1_email.Context.Media.Body('Email')

#format($core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_Status')) #token('status') #if ($context_v1_email.Context.Media.IsApproved) $core_v2_language.GetResource('Status_Published') #else $core_v2_language.GetResource('Status_NotPublished') #end #end
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_Status">Status: {status}</resource> <resource name="FlagAsAbuse">Flag as spam/abuse</resource> <resource name="Footer">You received this email because you're an owner of {gallery_name_link}. This gallery is set to notify owners when it has new posts.</resource> <resource name="Footer_FlagAsAbuse">{flag_as_abuse_link}.</resource> <resource name="Status_NotPublished">Not Published</resource> <resource name="Status_Published">Published</resource> <resource name="Subject">{gallery_name}: {media_name}</resource> </language>
